other_tests.findings: The liver demonstrates increased echogenicity consistent with hepatic steatosis. No intrahepatic biliary dilatation or focal masses. Gallbladder morphology consistent with adenomyomatosis. Common bile duct not dilated, measuring about 3 mm. Right pleural effusion present. Main portal vein patent with hepatopetal flow. Right kidney measures 11.2 cm with no hydronephrosis, nephrolithiasis, or suspicious masses. Left kidney measures 11.4 cm without hydronephrosis, nephrolithiasis, or suspicious masses. Spleen normal in size, measuring 10 cm.
